Player History
Injured on 5/17/2004 with a Bruised Neck, out for 3 days...
Released by Texas on 9/23/2005...
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by Oakland in 2008...
Traded from Oakland to Tampa Bay on 2/25/2010 (Going to TB: C C. Bethancourt. Going to OAK: P C. Thielbar)...
Injured on 4/5/2011 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Boston on 7/31/2013 (Going to BOS: 1B C. Hart, RF G. Stanton, 3B H. Dozier, C C. Bethancourt. Going to TB: C J. Saltalamacchia, 3B N. Swisher)...
Traded from Boston to Texas on 1/31/2014 (Going to TEX: RF G. Stanton, P D. Keuchel, 3B H. Dozier, C C. Bethancourt. Going to BOS: 2B M. Betts, SS T. Pena, P C. Buchholz)...
Released by Texas on 4/1/2018...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 5/9/2018 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 6/16/2018, off David Price (CHW)...
Drafted in 2nd round, 39th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1978...
Injured on 4/28/1979 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 7/7/1980 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/22/1980 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 6/19/1983...
Injured on 6/15/1984 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1984, winning 2 games with a 1.59 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1984, winning 2 games with a 2.00 ERA...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (N) on 7/31/1984 (Going to NYM: P G. Stablein. Going to CHC: P J. Corsi)...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1986, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1986, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1986, going 6-1, 1.36...
